en-US.summary: Making dinner just got easy! Discover delicious recipes in seconds by listing the ingredients you have at home.
en-US.name: Recipe Genie
en-US.description:
Turn your ingredients in your kitchen into delicious dishes, drinks, or even desserts.
Just add your ingredients, search for a recipe, pick a recipe you like, and begin - it's that simple!
To search for a specific recipe, you could say "only show smoothie".

Once you've searched for and selected a recipe, you can either hear the ingredients and instructions, or get the recipe sent to your Alexa app on your phone!
If you have an alexa device with a screen:
-you can view and delete ingredients while they're being added
-you can see recipes from the search results
-you can view your selected recipe!

Once opening the skill, try saying: 
"I have chicken, potatoes, and corn". 
Then, say "search recipes".
Pick a recipe you like, gather ingredients, and begin making it.
en-US.updatesDescription: The whole experience is displayed visually on APL compatible devices (devices with screens!)

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
First you have to add ingredients to the search and then say search recipes to search when you're done adding your ingredients. For example, start by saying:
"Add chicken corn and potatoes". 
After that, say:
"Search recipes".

 Then, select a recipe you like.
You could say "start recipe" to select the first recipe, or "next recipe" to proceed.
After that, you can say "hear instructions", "hear ingredients", or "send recipe to phone". 
After you have heard the instructions, for example, you could say "hear ingredients". 
An example of a full run in sequential order after the app has been opened could be: 
"open recipe genie", "Alexa add pasta, chicken, and tomatoes.", "search recipes", "start recipe", "hear ingredients", "hear instructions". Say next step until instructions are completed.
